meanings.definition: The quality of being overly particular or fussy about small details.
meanings.sent1: Her persnicketiness about the color of the curtains delayed the home decoration process.
meanings.sent2: His persnicketiness when it comes to grammar can be quite annoying at times.
meanings.sent3: The persnicketiness of the cat about the placement of its toys always makes us smile.
meanings.sent4: The persnicketiness of the chef in the kitchen was like a symphony of precision and care.
meanings.sent5: The persnicketiness of the old clockmaker was evident in every delicate tick and tock.

meanings.definition: A tendency to be easily irritated or annoyed by minor things.
meanings.sent1: The persnicketiness of his boss made the work environment tense and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stand his persnicketiness about the volume of the TV.
meanings.sent3: The persnicketiness of the toddler over his toys was both amusing and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: Her persnicketiness was like a storm brewing, ready to unleash at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The persnicketiness of the old man about his routine was a sight to behold.
